resources.string: Determine tools needed to install one of the following:

1 Phillips Head Screwdriver 
 Allen Wrench kit 
 Flathead Screw Driver 
 1/2" Wrench

Tape Measure
 Level 
 Hammer 
 Square 
 Drill with bits 
 Screws 
 Patience.

Box cutter or scissors 
 Hex wrench set (typically 6mm, 5mm and 4mm wrenches are required) 
 Pedal wrench 
 Cable cutters 
 Bike grease 
 Bike stand (preferred) 
 Bike pump 
 Philips Head screw driver
